forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to cloudy skies and rain during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 63F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low near 10C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 52F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.
